Articles.Content:
This is the Space Launch System or SLS. It was made to take people to an asteroid and eventually to mars. I did not make this mod i used other mods to make it.

In this mod you have a complete replica of the SLS crew and cargo version. The crew version does not have a lander; the cargo version however is only a lander and has no crew. This means that to land this craft you must do the same as NASA, dock the lander to the crew module in space and take it to its destination. It can go to Duna and its Moon, Eve and its Moon or the Mun in a round trip. Might get to Jool or Eelo if refuled in Space. I suggest that when you launch it, to turn on the unbreakable joints cheat because for some reason at launch it goes crazy and shakes a lot but gets under control after a few thousand meters high.

NO MODS ARE REQUIRED. ALL ARE IN THE DOWNLAOD.

If I missed a part in the file tell me in a post.

The mods I used were:

-Jool V (For Main engine)

-Tiberdyne Space Shuttle (For boosters)

-Mechjeb (To control it easier)

-KSPX Parts Expansion (For second stage engine)

-Munar Excursion Module (For the top stage)

-Part Generator (For all tanks)

-Fairing Factory (For all fairings and to make it look real and cool)

DOWNLOAD

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ws7elb05tj8pi75/KSP%20SLS%20%282%29.zip

Edited May 20, 2013 by astroadrian99

This is not the place to share ships, mate.

This is where we share mods. And mostly mods that we made ourselves. OR have permission to share and/or update because the original owner doesn't want to anymore.

I don't think you can offer mods of others for download.

(this doesn't even look like anything SLS related, i think)

Ok one thing whats NERVA spamming

Ok one thing whats NERVA spamming
putting a "ton" of NERVAs where actually not a single one of them exists on the replicated spacecraft.

putting a "ton" of NERVAs where actually not a single one of them exists on the replicated spacecraft.

ok and whats NERVA I dont much about this.

ok and whats NERVA I dont much about this.
A NERVA engine is a nuclear rocket motor:

In the game they are called "LV-N atomic rocket motor".
This probably belongs to the spacecraft exhange. I'm not sure if you're allowed to put mods in the download file, though. Some modders don't like it.

A NERVA engine is a nuclear rocket motor:

In the game they are called "LV-N atomic rocket motor".

oh ok now I understand. Actually I only made it with 3 nuclear engine and 6 of the regular gimbal engines but I did that because Nasa does not have a lander for it yet so I just mixed two that I found in the Internet.

I tried to get looks of this one.(top lander)

And the ability to stage from this one.

However if I wanted it to land and then stage while taking off I will need to have in the last stage the nuclear engine to allow the lander to get off Duna's gravity and dock with the orbiting craft. But also the stage needed a lot more fuel needing more engines because it needs to land the lander while still having enough fuel to rise back up. That's why it has so many engines.
